page.title: 01LANDSCAPE OF THE AREA
page.content: { { The area lies 2km to the south east of Doncaster. It is a{low lying} area with the highest point being only {33m above sea level.}A ridge of{bunter {sandstone}trending north to south extends along the western part of the area. The land slopes gently to the east and reaches its{lowest point}of {3m above sea level}in the south east corner. The{soils}are{sandy}and well drained. As a consequence the{farming} is mainly{arable}although{forest land dominates the area to the west of the A638. The whole area is pitted with {old sand and gravel workings}with the occasional quarry still in use.
